name: Bikini Bottom Survival
description:
Just an idea i had , first time developing on unity , game is unfinished and would appreciate some help, i'm bad at coding , there are some crashing and networking problems so just think of playing dayz but in bikini bottom, anyways you spawn with a few stuff that you would normally wouldn't this is just for gameplay showcase, you won't spawn with anything in the final game if i ever finish it :P 

to keep updated check out my facebook group page here : https://www.facebook.com/groups/2484222191831456/
